name: Francisco "Isko" Moreno Domagoso
education: International Academy of Management and Economics (BS)
Non-degree postgraduate education at Harvard Kennedy School and Oxford Saïd Business School
positions: Undersecretary of Social Welfare and Development for Luzon Affairs and Special Concerns (2017–2018)
policies: ISKOlar ng Bayan college scholarship program
₱500 monthly allowance to senior citizens, PWDs, and solo parents; ₱800 + birthday cake for elderly
Executive Order No. 43: Weekly clean-up drives in all barangays and City Hall offices
Ordinance No. 8695: Protecting LGBT community from discrimination
awards: Good Financial Housekeeping recognition from DILG (2019)
Top-performing mayor in NCR with 88% approval rating (2021)
Most Outstanding Filipino in Public Service Award (2012)
issues: Criticized 'black propaganda' during election campaign over past acting career (2007)
COA found 623 ghost employees in office; cases dismissed by Office of the Ombudsman (2012–2013)
COMELEC show-cause orders over alleged vote-buying activities (2025)
